toparea.ipcams_info: Flussonic works with almost all H264/H265 cameras, record video, capture motion events, provide multi user access via browser and mobile apps
toparea.iptv_info: Flussonic can take video from headends, transcode it, record for catchup and timeshift and play it out on all modern devices ingesting advert directly into stream.
toparea.iptv_info2:
Getting the stream through
a satellite receiver or a PC

features.onvif_info: Automated discovery and configuration for thousands of IP cameras
features.motion_info: Support for motion detection and integration with video analytics systems
features.web_info: All features are accessible in browser without any plugins
features.mobile_info: Mobile access to cameras and their archive
features.cloud_info: Support for Amazon S3, Openstack Storage and others for DVR and VOD makes your service scalable
features.mw_info: Flussonic can be integrated with your service without any expensive Java programmers
features.transcoder_info: Included transcoder will help you to get the best quality of service with multibitrate content
features.dvr_info: Flussonic has cloud and cluster capable DVR which is best on market

trial.name: Your name
trial.sent: Your request has been sent. Thank you!
trial.info1: Please fill this form to receive a trial key for your copy of our software. We usually reply within one day. You will get a fully functional 30-day trial.
trial.info2: If you don't get any email from us, check in Spam box and add us to contacts
trial.info3: Subscription starts from $50 per month. Please
trial.info4: to buy a license if you have already tried Flussonic.
